text: Un beau matin is the first solo album (and his third overall) by French experimental singer and composer Areski Belkacem, released in 1970 on the Saravah label. He would not release a new solo album until Le Triomphe de l'amour in 2010, instead collaborating with his lover and creative partner Brigitte Fontaine for the next few decades. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1970 albums Category:Areski Belkacem albums
title: Un beau matin
